A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie ever made.  Plot holes everywhere\, disjointed and contrived plot\, horrible subplots\, destroyed OT characters\, ultimate Mary Sue\, wasted character development.  Just an awful movie outside of score and visuals.  First star wars movie I didn't to see a second/third time in theaters\, won't be purchasing on blu ray\, and won't ever watch again.  A disgrace in every possible sense.
